practiceAreas: Car Accidents|Truck Accidents|Personal Injury|Wrongful Death|Medical Malpractice
description:
WilliamsFord is a personal injury law firm practicing in West Virginia, Virginia and Maryland. We have offices in Leesburg and Winchester, Virginia. With a recent $3 million jury verdict in Winchester Circuit Court, our firm has the experience you can rely on.

Our law firm has a track record of success when resolving cases involving motor vehicle accident injuries. We have helped many clients recover tens of thousands of dollars to cover their medical bills, repair damage to their property and compensate them for their pain and suffering.

We have a regional reputation for successful resolution of complex cases, especially in negotiation. This includes commercial vehicle accidents, particularly those along the Interstate 81 corridor. In this capacity, we deal with catastrophic truck injuries and wrongful death.

Our team also has experience navigating the complexities of medical malpractice lawsuits. This includes gynecological and birth injuries as well as other types of hospital or doctor negligence.

Not every personal injury case relates to a motor vehicle accident or medical malpractice. Our law firm also handles other types of cases, including slip-and-falls and other premises liability cases as well as incidents resulting in traumatic brain injuries and other serious injuries.

We attempt to be as accessible as possible to anyone with a valid injury claim. We offer initial consultations for free with no obligation. WilliamsFord also accepts credit card payments and provides virtual appointments.

Please note that case results depend upon a variety of factors unique to each case. Past successful case results do not guarantee or predict future results.
